  • Element
com.axonivy.jmx

Annotation Type MOperation


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Inherited
public @interface MOperation

    Use this annotation to manage a method as operation of a MBean.

    Example:

      @MBean
 public class MyBean
 {
   private int count;

    @MOperation
   private void increaseCounter()
   {
     return count++;
   }
 }

    This bean provides an operation increaseCounter

    You can use EL expressions to dynamically resolve the name and description of the managed operation.
    E.g. #{name} will be replaced by the value of the field name if it exists or the value returned by method getName().
    Also complex expressions like #{pmv.application.name} works.

    Example:

       @MBean(value="Test:type=TestType")
  public class TestBean
  {
     @MInclude
    private Counter errors = new Counter("errors");
  }

  public static class Counter
  {
    private int cnt=0;

    private String name;

    public Counter(String name)
    {
      this.name = name;
    }

    public String getCapitalizedName()
    {
      return StringUtils.capitalize(name);
    }

     @MOperation(name="reset#{capitalizedName}", description="Resets the #{name} counter")
    public void resetCnt()
    {
      cnt = 0;
    }
  }

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String description 
      MOperation.Impact impact 
      String name 
      String[] paramDescriptions 
      String[] params 

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Default:
        ""

      • description

        public abstract String description
        Default:
        ""

      • params

        public abstract String[] params
        Returns:
        names of the operation's parameters
        Default:
        {}

      • paramDescriptions

        public abstract String[] paramDescriptions
        Returns:
        descriptions of the operation's parameters
        Default:
        {}

      • impact

        public abstract MOperation.Impact impact
        Returns:
        impact of the operation
        See Also:
        MBeanOperationInfo.getImpact()
        Default:
        com.axonivy.jmx.MOperation.Impact.UNKNOWN
